div.head: 大便卒結
div.div: major relief suddenly bound; sudden constipation

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: major relief suddenly bound; sudden constipation

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a da bian mi 大便秘② , constipation that emerges all of a sudden, apparently not resulting from some previous pathological condition. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry yang ti 羊蹄 quoting Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 : 大便卒澀結不通 , “Defecation is suddenly associated with roughness and nodes, and failure to pass”, writes: 大便卒結 , “ Sudden constipation ”.
